Justia Legal Resources: Banking and Finance Law Center

Buying securities or taking out a loan can be intimidating, but consumers have recourse against misconduct by financial professionals or institutions. The Banking and Finance Law Center at Justia explains some of the key rules in this area.

Tip of the Month

Keeping Accurate Google Business Profile Hours

Given the nearly constant volatility of Google Map Pack results, having accurate business hours on your law firm's Google Business Profile and other online listings is crucial. This ensures that clients and potential clients are well-informed about when your firm will be open, fostering trust and reliability. However, you should not change your business hours solely for the purpose of attempting to improve rankings. Posting incorrect hours could lead to risks such as having your profile suspended due to unwarranted but hard-to-prevent complaints that your hours are inaccurate, which would outweigh any potential benefits.

Complimentary Virtual CLE Conference

Climate Pro Bono Bootcamp

Registration is open for the Climate Pro Bono Bootcamp: Complimentary Virtual CLE Conference that will be taking place on January 17 and 18, 2024. This event is intended for lawyers who are interested in using their legal skills to support climate-friendly causes, communities, and startups.


This free virtual event will discuss how to find pro bono opportunities and maximize your impact, and will provide specific instruction in the substantive skills you need to do pro bono work for renewable energy projects, climate startups, and more.


CLE is expected to be available for this event in CA, DE, IL, GA, NJ, NY, and PA, and may be made available in other jurisdictions upon request.


Click here for the agenda, speakers, and to register.
